title: Portable toilets for Occupy Galle Face protest, but will be taken away?
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Those who came to Galle Face to protest stated that they were grateful for the sanitary facilities provided for them.

Sanitary facilities have been provided for the protestors in form of mobile toilets, with three each reserved for men and women, and are also equipped with other necessary facilities for the sanitation needs of children as well.

Many protestors stated that although they did not know the benefactors, it is a commendable move, and some who even came from far away cities such as Kandy mentioned that this move only helps them to feel at home.

” I really feel at home with the facilities provided. I came all the way from Kandy, and by providing these mobile toilets, whoever the anonymous contributors are, they became a big support for us. The struggle is now complete,” a protestor said.
The protestors also mentioned that foodstuff, medicine, sanitary facilities and even water is being provided for everyone at the venue, and thereby have made the struggle even more justifiable.
